⚓Overview

⁣Test Documentation Project uses github’s in-built Github Pages facility to build a project website.

  • Test Documentation Project on Github
  • Test Documentation Project on Twitter
  • This is a CSS project

⚓ Download

The current version of Test Documentation Project is 1.0 you can download it below.

Test Documentation Project on Github Test Documentation Project v1.0

⚓Getting Started

Starting with Test Documentation Project

If a project has a website hosted on github pages it will have a gh-pages branch.

The project website will either be hosted at dharmafly.github.com/project-name/ or at a custom domain.

All project documentation should be put as markdown pages in the _posts directory.

Complete documentation can be found here: Reference
